name: RWBY - Reconstruction
description:
After the downfall of Beacon, Yang is left stranded at home in Patch. Ruby had left for Mistral despite her warnings, and she is left alone. But not for long. Unexpectedly, Weiss shows up at her house and over the next weeks, the two of them find comfort in each other's presence, even enough to learn a little more about each other.

This is a short fan project. RWBY and all related entities are property of Monty Oum and Rooster Teeth Productions, LLC.

This is also the first Visual Novel I've made, so understandably there might not be much content (there's only one scene with an option path), but please check it out anyway.

If this receives a lot of interest, I might consider working on a continuation.
